# "Anti-crossing problem" Template
This template shows you how to compute an Anti-crossing problem on <strong>Dynex</strong>

<p style="color: green;">FREE TEMPLATE (DYNEX DEVELOPERS)</p>

Dynex is the worldâ€™s first neuromorphic supercomputing blockchain based on the DynexSolve chip algorithm, a Proof-of-Useful-Work (PoUW) approach to solving real-world problems. The Dynex SDK is used to interact and compute on the Dynex Platform.
